title: Embroidered Picture, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Miss Wilhelmina L. Kechner
description: Panel of perforated white paper embroidered in colored wool with the words: "Glaube Liebe Hoffnung." At center is a heart, cross and anchor. Vine and foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: paper, wool
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Miss Wilhelmina L. Kechner. 1948-98-1.
